title: Dinnerbone: 优化游戏系统
author: obby825
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2015-8-19 08:06 编辑 


Dinnerbone: Got sidetracked working on mob AI that I started optimising AI, then pathfinding, and then block ticking. So many optimisations!
Dinnerbone: 正在工作于生物AI。我开始优化AI，然后是寻路，最后是方块更新刻。好多优化！


Dinnerbone: May not give FPS boosts because it's mostly serverside, but it should (hopefully) run noticeably smoother now - especially in multiplayer.
Dinnerbone: 这可能不会对FPS有所提升，因为它大多数是服务端的处理，但它应该（有希望 ）更平滑地运行——特别是在多人游戏中。


Dinnerbone: Very happy with the optimisations I made today. On 16 view distance, tickspeed seems to have sped up approximately 15%.
Dinnerbone: 我对于今天我做的优化非常满意。在16区块视距下，游戏更新速度看起来提高了15%。

replies.txt_content: 于是视距用于提高cb效率
